scripts.build: echo 'Building core with npm...' && sleep 2 && echo 'core build complete!'
scripts.dev: echo 'Starting core dev server with npm...' && while true; do echo '[core] Dev server running...'; sleep 5; done
scripts.test: echo 'Running core tests with npm...' && sleep 1 && echo 'core tests passed!'
scripts.lint: echo 'Linting core with npm...' && sleep 1 && echo 'core linting complete!'
